abstract: “The Jay Leno Show” will exit prime time on Feb. 11, NBC confirmed on Sunday. But the network does not yet know what its future late-night lineup will look like.
snippet: “The Jay Leno Show” will exit prime time on Feb. 11, NBC confirmed on Sunday. But the network does not yet know what its future late-night lineup will look like.
lead_paragraph: Updated | 2:59 p.m.  “The Jay Leno Show” will exit prime time on Feb. 11, NBC confirmed on Sunday. But the network does not yet know what its future late-night lineup will look like.

headline.main: NBC Confirms Leno Will Leave Prime Time in February
